content.title: Thread 3 MVP complete
content.body:
Created execution loop components:
- core.py: Local wellspring_core with fixed session paths
- wellspring_agent.py: Claude API wrapper with context assembly, thought parsing, storage
- test_agent.py: Dry-run and full-loop test scripts
- README.md: Usage documentation

Entry point achieved: hardcoded context → Claude API → parse single thought → store

Next: Thread 2 integration for RAG-based context retrieval.
